ygData.subject: Re: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree 100% I do think we need to send a leter to GZ but one other thing that may need to be mentioned the the lack of bard only weapons. there is what 2 that
ygData.messageBody:
I agree 100% I do think we need to send a leter to GZ but one other thing
that may need to be mentioned the the lack of bard only weapons. there is
what 2 that you have to in a group of 50s to get. I always found that this
was unfair that every class had special weapons for them and we had none
till recently but those are unobtainable for people like myself whos highest
character is lvl 22. I love kiting but sometimes i feel like fulfilling the
warrior side of me and usually get my but kicked because we dont have any
decent weapons. Why not have a bard only weapon that procfs Bellow of DDD or
something.

Taerian Valmont of Povar
Jester to Erollis Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Chris <cjeffrey@...>
To: <chrisj@...>
Sent: Sunday, November 21, 1999 7:06 AM
Subject: Fw: [eqbards] Skill Caps
